channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: Vite ! Le Pixel 10 chute à 635 € sur Amazon (fin de la vente à minuit)
item.description: Plus que deux heures. C'est le temps qu'il vous reste pour attraper le Google Pixel 10 à un prix qui n'a aucun sens.

item.title: Best Black Friday Deals 2025: We've Tested Every Item and Tracked Every Price
item.description: Our Reviews team has scoured the entire internet to find the best Black Friday deals on gear we've tested and approved.

item.title: I tested a whole bunch of vacuums, and these are the best lightweight options
item.description: If you're seeking cleaning that isn't a workout, step this way.

item.title: Logitech G203 : la souris gamer de référence au prix d’un sandwich
item.description: Besoin d'une souris de secours fiable ? Ne cherchez pas plus loin. La Logitech G203, une valeur sûre du gaming, s'affiche à 9,99 €. À ce prix-là, c'est moins cher que les copies chinoises douteuses, avec la qualité suisse en prime.

item.title: Black Friday Cdiscount : le top départ est donné, voici les premières vraies offres
item.description: Cdiscount n'a pas la patience d'attendre vendredi. Le géant bordelais vient d'ouvrir les vannes de son Black Friday avec une agressivité habituelle sur la tech. On a épluché des centaines de pages pour ne garder que les vraies baisses de prix.

item.title: OpenAI apologizes for big Mixpanel data breach that exposed emails and more – here's what we know
item.description: Heard about an 'OpenAI data breach'? It's not actually the company that was compromised, but a partner, and here's what that means for ChatGPT users.

item.title: 19 best Dyson Black Friday 2025 deals – my expert-vetted discounts on stick vacs, Airwraps and more (plus the best cheaper dupes)
item.description: Dyson's Black Friday 2025 deals in Australia are here with hundreds to be saved on premium tech, plus there are plenty of Dyson dupes to choose from too.

item.title: 9 of my favorite Black Friday deals on rugged phones - these are the phones I recommend based on my rigorous shock, drop, and performance tests
item.description: I've tested and benchmarked rugged phones for years, and these are my top picks for picking up a tough, go-anywhere phone cheaply this Black Friday.

item.title: The Ray-Ban Meta smart glasses are at their best-ever price for Black Friday
item.description: Meta may have just released the Ray-Ban Meta (Gen 2) at the end of October, but they’re not significantly different from the last-gen model introduced in 2021. The overall experience is very similar, which is why the original Ray-Ban Meta smart glasses remain a great buy, especially now that they’re on sale for an all-time […]

item.title: Opera Neon’s AI researcher does in one minute what used to take a dozen tabs
item.description: Opera Neon can do a deep dive in a minute of research, and now lets you pick your AI model.

item.title: SSD 2 To à 116 € : Crucial brade le P310, parfait pour les joueurs à l’étroit sur PC et PS5
item.description: Marre de devoir désinstaller Warzone pour faire rentrer GTA ? C'est le problème numéro un de la PS5, et le Black Friday vient enfin le régler. Avec ce SSD Crucial de 2 To à 116 €, vous ne choisissez plus : vous gardez tout. C'est l'investissement le plus rentable que vous ferez pour votre console cette année.

item.title: This Dell 14 Plus is the best all-around laptop deal in the Black Friday sales - save £250
item.description: Move over, MacBook Pro, this Dell 14 Plus is the portable powerhouse for Windows users

item.title: PC portable Lenovo à 249 € : 16 Go de RAM à ce prix, c’est une anomalie du marché
item.description: Trouver un PC portable neuf avec 16 Go de RAM et un SSD de 512 Go à moins de 250 €, ça n'existe théoriquement pas.

item.title: 160+ Amazon Black Friday deals: Score best-ever deals on AirPods, Kindles, Legos, and Fire TVs
item.description: Amazon Black Friday 2025 is already underway, and you can buy Fire TVs starting at $99. Shop record prices on Kindle, Bose, Lego, and Apple products.

item.title: Maybe don't trust every Windows Update without checking - hackers hijack images to spread dangerous malware
item.description: Hackers use fake Windows Update screens and steganographic images to deliver multi-stage malware that executes silently through deceptive command prompts.

item.title: Malicious Blender model files deliver StealC infostealing malware
item.description: Another open source platform being abused to infect users with infostealers.

item.title: I've hand-picked 28 of the best Black Friday kitchen appliance deals from Ninja, Breville, KitchenAid and more

item.title: Amazon AU's Black Friday deals include record low prices on select items – I've filtered out the best 170+ offers you can nab right now
item.description: With Black Friday here now, there's just four days left to shop all the best Amazon deals on Kindles, air fryers, vacuums, phones, cameras and more.

item.title: Missouri to enforce mandatory age verification in three days
item.description: Missouri is the latest US state to enforce age verification legislation, and it's set to provoke yet another surge in VPN usage. Here's what's at stake for your privacy, and what you can do about it.

item.title: This Thanksgiving’s real drama may be Michael Burry versus Nvidia
item.description: Is Burry the canary in the coal mine, warning of a collapse that's inevitable? Or could his fame, his track record, his now unrestricted voice, and a fast-growing audience trigger the very implosion he's predicting?

item.title: Amazon's rival to Starlink offers "fastest downloads and uploads" - but how will it stack up in real life?
item.description: Amazon pushes Leo Ultra into enterprise testing with high-speed claims, direct AWS links, and expanding satellite coverage.
